How to generate source code documentation (MS Windows users):

1. Install Doxygen v1.5.5 (www.doxygen.org) and Graphviz v2.18 (http://www.graphviz.org)
2. Open the 'Dozyfile' file in the Doxygen Wizard.
3. Generate documentation by clicking Start.
4. HTML-type documentation is found in readme.html which links to .\docs\index.html
